The only way to learn is to do it. Thanks #3 posted 03-23-2010 03:44 PM 94 posts in 2107 days home | projects | blog Jim K -- Methods are many,Principles are few.Methods change often,Principles never do. Remake a base using the current one as a template. Use Lexan, (an Acrylic plastic, not Plexiglas) makes for a great plate. Bit Diameter Maximum Speed (RPM) Up to 1” 24,000 1 1/4” to 2”
